lead_paragraph: Roger Federer moved into the final of the Gerry Weber Open with a 6-4, 6-7 (4), 6-3 victory over Tommy Haas in Halle, Germany. Federer moved a victory from equaling Bjorn Borg's grass-court record of 41 victories from 1976 to 1981.
